message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $12,000. I think it's a great value and I'm confident you'll love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate you considering my budget.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can't go higher than $10,000 at this point.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $11,500. I think it's a fair price considering the value it brings. Let me know what you think.
